cards.title: Curse of Arwen
body: At the start of the Environment turn, 1 Player may discard 2 cards to destroy this card.
Hero characters may not deal damage on their own turn.
If Curse of Lillith is ever in play, destroy it or destroy this card.

cards.title: Curse of Lillith
body: At the start of the Environment turn, each Player may discard 1 card each to destroy this card.
Hero characters may only deal damage on their own turn.
If Curse of Arwen is ever in play, destroy it or destroy this card.

cards.title: Curse of Seren
body: At the start of the Environment turn, this cards deals all non-environment targets 2 infernal damage. If all targets were dealt damage this way, destroy this card.
Targets may not deal damage the turn they enter play.

cards.title: Curse of Sybil
body: When a villain card would enter play, you may discard it instead and destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, this card deals all non-environment targets {H} infernal damage.

cards.title: Curse of Evanora
body: At the start of the Environment turn, 1 player may discard their hand to destroy this card.
At the start of any hero's turn, their player may discard a card. If they do, they may draw a card. If a card was drawn this way, put a token on this card.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each hero target X + 1 infernal damage, where X is the number of tokens on this card.

cards.title: Tripped Wards
body: At the start of the Environment turn, destroy this card.
When this card enters play, [b]Discover[/b] {H - 2} curse cards.
When this card is destroyed, this card deals all non-environment targets X infernal damage, where X is the number of curses in play.

cards.title: Sybil the Clairvoyant
body: At the start of the Environment turn, play the top card of the Villain deck.
When this card enters play, [b]Summon[/b] the Curse of Sybil.
At the end of the Environment turn, reveal the top 2 cards of the Villain deck. Put 1 on the top and 1 on the bottom of the Villain deck.

cards.title: Evanora the Bargainer
body: At the start of the Environment turn, each player may discard 2 cards. Any player that does deals 1 non-environment 2 infernal damage.
When this card enters play, [b]Summon[/b] the Curse of Evanora.
At the end of the Environment turn, 1 hero may draw X cards, where X is the number of hero cards discarded this turn.

cards.title: Arwen the Scheming
body: At the start of the Environment turn, each player draws a card.
When this card enters play, [b]Summon[/b] the Curse of Arwen.
At the end of the Environment turn, this card deals the {H - 2} hero character cards with the lowest HP X infernal damage, where X is number of hero cards discarded this turn.

cards.title: Seren the Profound
body: At the start of the Environment turn, 1 Player may discard 2 cards. If no cards were discarded this way, restore this card to full HP.
When this card enters play, [b]Summon[/b] the Curse of Seren.
At the end of the Environment turn, select a target. That target cannot deal damage or be damaged until the end of the next Environment turn.

cards.title: Lillith the Accursed
body: At the start of the Environment turn, each player discards 1 card.
When this card enters play, [b]Summon[/b] the Curse of Lillith.
At the end of the Environment turn, play the top card of the Environment deck.

cards.title: Coven's Call
body: When this card enters play, shuffle the environment trash into its deck. [b]Discover[/b] {H - 2} witch cards.
At the end of the environment turn, destroy this card.
